alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hardin County through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pickwick Landing State Park, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Pickwick Landing State Park, Pickwick Dam, Counce, Maddox, Walkertown, Winn Springs, Bruton Branch and Red Sulphur Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
